** Tasks

1. [X] Create data structures
2. [X] Create parser (a class that populates data structures with parameters from a file)
3. [X] Create solution in ParaView format
4. [X] Stitch everything together & build
5. [ ] Implement the Godunov solver
6. [ ] Ensure the correctness of boundary conditions
